title: Reis (Luís Maria dos)
body: This Madeiran was born on December 9, 1846, and passed away on December 6, 1920, in the rank of retired general. He wrote a booklet, published in Funchal in 1892, entitled 'Organization and History of the 12th Hunters Regiment'.

Luís Maria dos Reis: Born on December 9, 1846, and passed away on December 6, 1920, in the rank of retired general

1846: Luís Maria dos Reis was born
1892: Luís Maria dos Reis published the booklet 'Organization and History of the 12th Hunters Regiment'
